biography: Heinz Schuller started working in the games industry in 1993, and has served at companies including Viacom New Media, FASA Interactive, Microsoft Game Studios, and Day 1 Studios. He is credited with Art Direction on popular PC & Console games including Mechwarrior 4: Vengeance, F.E.A.R. 3, and Avatar Laser Wars II. Heinz also served as Publishing Art Director at Microsoft on games like Mechassault, Mechassault 2, and Crimson Skies: High Road to Revenge. Presently he is working on a new indie game for PC called Savage Lands.
